ThingDef.label: jam
ThingDef.description:
A sweet spread made by cooking fruits with sugar, jam preserves the flavors of ripe fruit while creating a thick, spreadable consistency. It often includes pieces of fruit or pulp, making it a delightful addition to bread, pastries, or desserts.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations</color> (assuming bottling station is used):

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 jam requires fruits and sugar with a total value of 60.20, and sells for 15, giving a <color=#33CC33>59.87%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 3000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.05</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>150</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.26</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: chutney
ThingDef.description:
A rich, tangy-sweet condiment made by combining fruits, spices, and vinegar. Chutneys vary in texture and flavor, from smooth to chunky, and are used to add a burst of flavor to savory dishes, balancing sweetness with a hint of tartness and spice.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 chutney requires jams, spices and vinegar for a total value of 193.20, and sells for 100, giving a <color=#33CC33>80.68%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 5000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.2</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>1000</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>2.30</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
